---
layout: cheatsheet
tags: calculator math plot graph function
logo: data:image/svg+xml;base64,
section:
  - name: Rate conversion
    commands:
      Update rates: qalc --exrates
      Currencies: qalc 1 EUR to USD
      Bitcoin: qalc 1 BTC to EUR
  - name: Unit conversion
    commands:
      One day in seconds: qalc 1d to s
      Speed: qalc "30km / (1h + 30min) to km/h"
      Bytes: qalc 1MiB to bytes
  - name: Number conversion
    commands:
      to Binary: qalc 300 to binary
      to Hexadecimal: qalc 300 to hex
      to Octal: qalc 300 to octal
  - name: Equation Solver
    commands:
      Equation Solver: qalc "x^2 + 2x + 7 = 17"
  - name: Settings
    commands:
      Enable thousands separator (2 = locale): qalc --set "group 2"
---
